p: Chiliadenus glutinosus infusion has also been commonly recommended throughout the eastern regions of the peninsula to treat colds and flu. This could be associated with the antimicrobial and viricidal effect of borneol [ 72, 111]. For example, its effectiveness has been proven against herpes simplex virus 1 (HSV-1), the results showed a complete inhibition of viral replication at a concentration of 0.06%. Kaempferol is also an effective antiviral, it has been proven effective against the herpes simplex virus, cytomegalovirus, influenza virus (responsible for seasonal flu), and the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). Kaempferol inhibits the reverse transcriptase enzyme and viral and binding proteases, stopping the viral replication of the mentioned viruses [ 97, 114].
